subject: Olympic Games
Swimming
Olympic Games (2012)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jessica Hardy, a breaststroke world-record holder, was cleared this week to compete in the 2012 London Olympics if she makes the United States team next year.
snippet: Jessica Hardy, a breaststroke world-record holder, was cleared this week to compete in the 2012 London Olympics if she makes the United States team next year.
